body.name: ANDFZ Smart Watch(Call Receive/Dial/Reject), 1.85'' Full Touch Screen SmartWatch for Android and iOS Phones, Fitness Tracker with Call/Text/Heart Rate/19 Sport Modes/Step Counter for Men Women
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
FREE pickup Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest pickup Wednesday, February 14. Order within 4 hrs 17 mins
features: 【Call Receiving/Dialing and Message Reminder】With this bluetooth calling smart watch, just turn on your phone's bluetooth to connect this smart watch for men and women through the app, with AI voice control. With the high-fidelity speaker, you can make calls/calls on your wrist Answer/reject calls, also receive and read message/app notifications (Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp, Instagram, Skype, Line, WeChat, etc.) directly from the watch (Reminder: You cannot reply to messages)

【1.85"-inch screen/DIY dial】：The smart watch adopts a 1.85-inch large screen. Ultra-thin bezel display. You can adjust the brightness on the watch to see the display clearly. There are a variety of watch faces and DIY watch face designs. You can customize the dial through the APP and choose the dial style you like. Using the quick APP, slide the interface on the right to enter the frequently used functions, which is convenient and quick.

【24-hour healthy heart rate detection and 20 multi-sport】Newly upgraded smart watch for men and women, real-time detection of your heart rate 24 hours a day. Android smart watch has more than 20 kinds of sports detection, such as running, yoga, kicking and other sports to detect heart rate and physical health at all times. It is the best gift for family and friends.

【AI Voice Control/Music Play】Click the AI voice function in the smart watch to activate the voice assistant in the fitness tracker and control the phone as you like, and control the mobile phone to make calls, play music, ask the weather, and navigate at will. IP67 life waterproof. Satisfy daily hand washing, running in the rain. (Note: not suitable for diving, sea swimming or sauna)

【Large Battery Capacity & Broad Compatibility】Equipped with a large capacity battery,charging takes only 1.5H, this activity tracker smart phone watch can be used 7 days .This Bluetooth smart watch can support most android and iOS smart phones(andriod 5.0 and above iOS 9.0 and above).

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: AI voice assistant makes your life more intelligent, call your AI voice assistant anytime, anywhere, free your hands, no need to manually search for information on your phone.Smart watch for android phones can make and receive calls, and receive notifications or text messages from phone apps.With this bluetooth call smart watch, you don't miss any important calls, hands-free when at home or walking, running, by using high-fidelity waterproof speakers.You can make, answer and refuse a call on your wrist, also receive message/app notification, listening to music via the smartwatch directly which is more intelligent than the other similar smartwatches. Never miss a call and a message.After the smart watch is connected to your smartphone, please open the corresponding software message notifications in the APP so that the smart watch with text and call can receive notifications normally.Bluetooth calls (dialing, answering, rejecting) can only be made after audio Bluetooth is linked.The Bluetooth connection distance should not exceed ten meters.When making a call from your watch, you can choose to answer it with your watch or with your mobile phone.Can add 10 phone's contacts through APP(need to finish the APP connection first).

With this bluetooth call smart watch, you don't miss any important calls, hands-free when at home or walking, running, by using high-fidelity waterproof speakers.You can make, answer and refuse a call on your wrist, also receive message/app notification, listening to music via the smartwatch directly which is more intelligent than the other similar smartwatches. Never miss a call and a message.Bluetooth calls (dialing, answering, rejecting) can only be made after audio Bluetooth is linked.When making a call from your watch, you can choose to answer it with your watch or with your mobile phone.

Smart watch for android phones can make and receive calls, and receive notifications or text messages from phone apps.After the smart watch is connected to your smartphone, please open the corresponding software message notifications in the APP so that the smart watch with text and call can receive notifications normally.

ANDFZ Smart watch provides 20 sports modes (Support:walking, running, cycling, mountaineering, football, badminton, basketball, table tennis, Rope skipping, tennis, yoga, swimming, elliptical machine, baseball, football, Hula Hoop, golf, long jump, sit-ups, volleyball,etc.).Smartwatches can be connected to the GPS of the mobile phone to obtain the exercise track, pace, and the activity tracker can accurately track calories, distance, steps, exercise time, exercise heart rate. Smartwatch for iphone compatible help you exercise scientifically. (Note: It is forbidden to wear a watch for diving, or showering.)

ANDFZ smart watch has a custom dial library and DIY personalized dial setting function, which always meets your stylish personality.The ANDFZ smart watch has a newly upgraded 1.85-inch narrow-frame IFT high-definition display screen, the purpose is to make the dial face of the smart watch display fuller, brighter and more delicate colors.You can meet your photo as a DIY dial face, or you can find a dial that suits your personality in the app dial library.You can choose from a variety of selected themes(the dial needs to be downloaded separately on the app side). If you want to have your own unique smartwatch, you can also use your favorite photo as the background of your screensaver.This watch can not only be self-used , but also as a gift for parents and children at various festivals, all of which are the best choices.

After successfully connecting the dual Bluetooth of the smart watch to the smart phone, you can play your favorite music anytime and anywhere according to your mood. When you are exercising, you can also exercise while playing music, which can relax your mood!

When the smart watch is successfully connected to the smart phone, the smart watch will update the local time and weather temperature in real time, and you can add clothes as needed and prepare the items you need to bring when you go out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Inexpensive. Good quality but mostly for blood pressure and exercise. Good volume for answering calls. I really like it. I bought a man’s smartwatch because, for me, itiseasier to use. Worth the money.
